name: UIDocument
description: The UIDocument class represents the user interface for a Revit document.

properties.name: ActiveView
properties.description: Gets or sets the active view.

methods.name: ShowElements(ElementSet)
methods.description: Shows elements in the active view.

methods.name: ShowElements(Element)
methods.description: Shows an element in the active view.

methods.name: PromptToSelectElementsOfType(Type, String)
methods.description: Prompts the user to select elements of a specific type.
